DOC.brief_summary: The use femtosecond laser cataract surgery give equivalent improve result comapred conventional phaco-emulsification surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study evaluate feasibility LensAR laser system surgically intervene within crystalline lens . The primary goal initial study establish safety parameter compare conventional phacoemulsification procedure , evaluate ability provide accurate consistent anterior capsular opening ( capsulotomy ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must sign give copy write informed consent form . Subjects must elect undergo lens extraction foldable monofocal IOL implantation ( ideally type ) , elect LensAR laser surgery . Subjects must willing able return schedule followup examination minimum 12 month surgery . Central 8 mm clear cornea without vascularization . Subjects prior anterior segment vitreoretinal surgical intervention eye treat . Subjects lenticular cataract nuclear grade great Grade 4 LOCS III scale . Subjects attain ocular dilation 7.0 mm . Subjects anterior segment pathology eye treat directly improve lens extraction IOL implantation . Subjects residual , recurrent , active ocular uncontrolled eyelid disease corneal abnormality ( include endothelial dystrophy , guttata , recurrent corneal erosion , etc . ) eye treat . Subjects ophthalmoscopic sign keratoconus ( keratoconus suspect ) eye treat . Subjects history severe dry eye respond therapy . Subjects macular degeneration , history retinal detachment , fundus finding would pose risk safety acceptable visual outcome eye treat . Subjects history herpes zoster herpes simplex keratitis . Subjects history steroidresponsive rise intraocular pressure , glaucoma , glaucoma suspect . Subjects diabetic retinopathy , autoimmune disease , connective tissue disease , pseudoexfoliation syndrome , clinically significant atopic syndrome . Subjects chronic systemic corticosteroid immunosuppressive therapy may affect wound healing , immunocompromised subject . Subjects use ophthalmic medication ( ) artificial tear treatment ocular pathology include ocular allergy . Subjects use systemic medication significant ocular side effect . Subjects pregnant , lactating , childbearing potential practicing medically approve method birth control . Subjects know sensitivity plan study concomitant medication . Subjects participate ophthalmic drug device clinical trial time clinical investigation .
